title: Epic: Documentation Lifecycle Phase 2 - Ergonomics & Automation
description:
Phase 2 builds on Phase 1 asset management foundations, adding automation, link rewriting, and quality-of-life improvements. Transforms documentation lifecycle from manual validation process into streamlined, automated system.

## Problem Statement

**Phase 1 delivers** safe manual archival with asset tracking, but requires:
- One-doc-at-a-time archival operations
- Manual cleanup of old documentation  
- Cannot handle shared assets with relative links
- Limited format support (Markdown only)
- No automation based on issue lifecycle

**Phase 2 addresses** ergonomics and automation needs identified through v1.0 usage.

## Solution: Ergonomics & Automation

### Link Rewriting Engine
- Parse and update links when docs/assets move
- Enable archival of docs with relative shared links
- Preserve link semantics (relative vs absolute)
- Format-specific rewriting via adapters

### Batch Operations (jit doc sweep)
- Archive multiple docs based on criteria
- Query by release, date, or issue state
- Dry-run preview before execution
- Atomic batch operations with rollback

### Asset Normalization (jit doc assets collect)
- Convert shared assets to per-doc layout
- Update all references across documents
- Enable safe archival of previously blocked docs

### Additional Format Adapters
- AsciiDoc support (widely used)
- Optional: reStructuredText (Python ecosystem)
- Optional: MDX (React documentation)

### LFS Handling
- Detect LFS pointers in assets
- Policy-based behavior (require/allow/prefer)
- Proper snapshot export handling

### Archival Automation
- Policy-based automatic archival
- Trigger on issue state transitions
- Scheduled sweeps
- Configurable retention periods

## Scope - Features

### In Scope (v1.1)
1. Link rewriting engine (5 days)
2. jit doc assets collect (3 days)
3. jit doc sweep batch archival (5 days)
4. AsciiDoc adapter (3 days)
5. LFS pointer handling (2 days)
6. Optional: reST/MDX adapters (3 days each)
7. Automation framework (4 days)

### Out of Scope (Future)
- External asset download automation
- Rendering/publishing pipelines
- Cross-repository dependencies
- WYSIWYG editing integration
- Automated format conversion

## Dependencies

**Requires:**
- Phase 1 complete (all 7 tasks)
- Milestone v1.0 shipped
- User feedback on Phase 1 ergonomics
- Real-world usage data

**Blocks:**
- Advanced snapshot features (Phase 3+)
- Archive compression/cloud storage
- Git hook integration
